Package Models

Class Map

java.lang.Object
Models.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Map extends Object implements Serializable
this model class manages all the maps.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel

    • checkContinentConnectivity

      public Boolean checkContinentConnectivity() throws InvalidMap
      Checks All Continent's Inner Connectivity.
      Returns:
      Boolean Value if all are connected
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if any continent is not Connected

    • subGraphConnectivity

      public boolean subGraphConnectivity(Continent p_continent) throws InvalidMap
      Checks Inner Connectivity of a Continent.
      Parameters:
      p_continent - Continent being checked
      Returns:
      Bool Value if Continent is Connected
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Which country is not connected

    • dfsSubgraph

      public void dfsSubgraph(Country p_c, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> p_continentCountry, Continent p_continent)
      Depth-First Search (DFS) applied to the subgraph of the continent.
      Parameters:
      p_c - country visited
      p_continentCountry - Hashmap of Visited Boolean Values
      p_continent - continent being checked for connectivity

    • checkCountryConnectivity

      public boolean checkCountryConnectivity() throws InvalidMap
      Evaluates country connectivity within the map.
      Returns:
      boolean value for condition if all the countries are connected
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - pointing out which Country is not connected

      Parameters:
      p_continentName - Name of the Continent to be Added
      p_controlValue - Control value of the continent to be added
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - to handle Invalid addition

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent(String p_continentName) throws InvalidMap
      Carries out the "Remove Continent" operation on the map, which involves deleting the specified continent along with its countries and associated data from the map.
      Parameters:
      p_continentName - Continent Name to be found
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Exception

      Parameters:

      p_neighbourName - Country to be added as neighbour

      p_neighbourName - Country to be removed as neighbor
      Throws:

    • updateNeighboursCont

      public void updateNeighboursCont(Integer p_targetCountryId)
      Removes a particular country as a neighbor from all associated countries within continent objects. This operation is typically used when deleting a country object.
      Parameters:
      p_targetCountryId - Country to be removed

    • removeCountryNeighboursFromAll

      public void removeCountryNeighboursFromAll(Integer p_targetCountryId)
      Eliminates a particular country as a neighbor from all associated countries within the map's country list. This operation is typically employed when deleting a country object.
      Parameters:
      p_targetCountryId - Country to be removed
